name: Write LXC Notes
description:
Writes the container notes/description with all metadata markers.

This template runs at the end of container configuration (before start) to ensure all information from other conf-* scripts is available.

The notes contain:
- Hidden markers for machine parsing (oci-lxc-deployer:managed, oci-image, application-id, etc.)
- Visible Markdown content with application info, version, and links
